title: How long does it take for an account transfer to finish?
body: Just bought an account transfer from EU West to NA on my other account. But it says the account doesn't exist when I login on the NA server and the EU West server says the transfer has gone through. How long does it take to transfer?

replies.body: Those can take a little bit sometimes, but it looks like it's been 4 hours since you posted this so that account should have transferred successfully by this point. Let me know the name of that account if you still can't get logged in on NA!
